name: Ch.4BaseConvo4
_source: speak;Colm;So this is how heavy armor can be...|I don't get why people wear this stuff when they could just dodge the attacks...
speak;Gilliam;Hey!|What are you doing with my armor!
speak;Colm;I'm suprised you snuck up on me like that!|You're usually so loud with your armor on!
speak;Gilliam;Yeah, you're not so quiet when your marching around like that!|Now give back my armor!
speak;Colm;All right, all right.|No need to get so upset!|Here's your armor back!|Happy now?
speak;Gilliam;Hmph...|You could have just asked if you wanted to try on my armor.
speak;Colm;Really?|Well, it's not my style after all, so you can just forget about it.
speak;Gilliam;Don't make me clobber you, boy.
speak;Colm;Ha ha!|I would like to see you try!
